definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: This paper is concerned with strain measurement in central cross-section of cavia porcellus humerus in vivo.
sentences.chinese: 对豚鼠左前肢肱骨中央截面进行在体应交测量。

sentences.english: Thechestshould be broad, very deep and well let down between the forelegs.
sentences.chinese: 胸应该很宽，非常深，位于两前肢中间。

sentences.english: Head and forelimb of short hair.
The moderately broad chest tapers to a deep brisket, well let down between the forelegs.
sentences.chinese: 宽度适中的胸部，向下逐渐变细，在前肢之间放松。

sentences.english: However, Curcumin had an obvious effect on improving rat forelimb spasm induced by tryptamine hydrochloride.
sentences.chinese: 对盐酸色胺引起的大鼠前肢痉挛行为有明显增强作用。

sentences.english: Each hind leg moves in the path of the foreleg on the same side.
sentences.chinese: 每条后肢在行进中都与前肢在同一侧。

sentences.english: The source of the nerve cells that power the animals’ forelimbs shifted, from the brain to the spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 从脑部到脊椎控制动物前肢的神经细胞源开始演化。

sentences.english: Dewclaws may be removed. Feet as in front.
sentences.chinese: 狼爪可以切除，足爪与前肢相同。

sentences.english: A person's arms homologize with a quadruped's forelimbs.
sentences.chinese: 人的胳膊与四肢动物的前肢相应。

sentences.english: The distribution of forelimb arteries in a leopard was observed by perfusion.
sentences.chinese: 通过动脉灌注解剖观察了豹的前肢动脉分布。

sentences.english: The average of medulla exponent from the bodies of two subspecies was also bigger than that of their forelegs.
sentences.chinese: 两亚种躯干部上毛髓质指数的平均值均明显大于前肢。

sentences.english: On the forelegs from the carpus, or a little above, downward to the toes;
sentences.chinese: 前肢从腕骨或略高一些的地方，到足爪。

sentences.english: It had asymmetric flight feathers not only on the forelimb, but on the hindlimb as well.
sentences.chinese: 它已非对称飞羽不仅对前肢，但对后肢以及。

sentences.english: Shoulder well placed. The bones of the forelegs slightly bowed but firm at shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 肩胛位置恰当，前肢骨骼略呈弓形，但肩胛稳固。

sentences.english: The source of the nerve cells that power the animals' forelimbs shifted, from the brain to the spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 大脑脊髓的神经细胞提供了动物前肢移动的力量。

sentences.english: The doctor said the problem lied in its forelimb and it would not die.
sentences.chinese: 医生说问题在于它的前肢上，不过它不会死的。

definition: the four limbs of the body
foot of a bird or animal/paw/claws/talons
(coll.) foot of an animal or bird/(coll.) foot supporting a cooking pot etc
web (of feet of ducks, frogs etc)
ambulatory leg (of a crab, lobster, spider etc)
